alert.note: Alert for Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 19 at 2:40PM CST until February 21 at 6:00AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...CLIPPER SYSTEM WILL BRING SNOW MONDAY... .A passing Clipper system will bring snow to the region starting Monday afternoon and lasting into early Tuesday morning. Accumulations will likely make roads slick for both the Monday evening commute in northern Wisconsin and anyone with an early Tuesday morning commute. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON MONDAY TO 6 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches. The highest snowfall totals will be across the north along the Upper Peninsula border. * WHERE...Vilas County. * WHEN...From Noon Monday to 6 AM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
